start_faery_cutscene: ^Is that Melody? Yes. At least I've come to the right place.
^Everyone's forgotten all about music! And they don't even know they forgot!
fairy_earworm_scene: ^Oh dear! Oh no! I can't believe this is happening...
^The Evil EarWorm has stolen their music memories right out of their heads!
^Only Melody can help the village remember! Help us, Melody. You're our only hope...
end_fairy_cutscene: ^I guess I had better get dressed and see what chores I need to do this morning for the farm.
